text: Account setup guide: create an account, verify email, and complete profile setup.
Password reset steps: open settings, select security, and click reset password to receive an email link.
Billing and invoices: invoices are issued on the first of each month and can be downloaded from the billing portal.
Refund policy: refunds are available within 30 days for annual plans, excluding usage-based charges.
API rate limits: the default limit is 100 requests per minute with burst support for short periods.
Data retention: logs are retained for 30 days, while customer documents are retained for 180 days.
Meeting notes summarizer: capture decisions, action items, and owners from transcripts.
RAG support assistant: retrieve knowledge base passages and cite sources in responses.
Pricing overview: starter, team, and enterprise plans with monthly and annual billing options.
Export data: admins can export data from the settings page as a CSV file.
